name: BugEliminator
description:
Control the survival game of the blue character and the red character (automatic movement) connected

WASD mobile

A left mouse button is prohibited from red movement

Right mouse button acceleration

e -pause

Blue/red collision to the enemy will be injured

Use the blue line in the middle to eliminate the enemy

The enemy's death drops a round prop

控制蓝色角色和连接的红色角色（自动移动）的生存游戏 

wasd 移动 

鼠标左键 禁止红色移动 鼠标右键 加速 

e 暂停 

蓝/红 碰撞到敌人会受伤 

使用中间蓝色的线消除敌人 敌人死亡掉落圆形道具
